INSTALLED  VERSION SCREENSHOT:
 <a href="
http://bayimg.com/NamKhAAbP" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">

===================================================================================



iATKOS Instructions

PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE!!! Make sure you have got at LEAST an Apple sticker to put on your Aspire One
Or if not, go and BUY leopard off Apple and then proceed.
At least to properly license it. Which is what the apple sticker is.

You dont require this for installation but i reccomend it.

Burn this ISO with your favourite image burner such as Nero, 
PowerISO or MagicISO

CRucIAL: BACK UP ANY IMPORTANT DATA BEFORE PROCEEDING

Make sure you have an external USB DVD-RW Drive, i got mine for Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â£15 at PC World

Next, we need to hit F12 at the Acer splash screen and choose you ATAPI DVD Drive.

Then when Darwin displays, hit F8 and type -v cpus=1

Most OS's see my Intel Atom as dual core, and OSX86 won' t handle it properly
unless you have Kalyway with Vanilla kernal.

I found KalyWay too problematic.

When OS X starts up, you need to go onto the Disk Utility in the taskbar.

THINK BACK AND CHECK YOUR FILES ARE SAFELY BACKED UP.

Then you need to click your partition you are choosing to format.

Make sure you select Macintosh Extended (Journaled)

Then click Erase.

Exit the disk utility and proceed to Install.

Make sure to tick the Intel GMA 950 driver in the Custom install option.
And browse through for a compatable PS/2 driver for the keyboard.

Then once it is installed, it will restart...Now hit F8 and type CPUS=1 and press Enter.

You will need to type this every time until i find a fix. 

The Apple splash logo will appear, and after a short period you can register your new macbookmini :D

Once installed you will want the double tap on your touchpad right...?

To fix this go into System Preferences and choose Mouse.

Then browse through until you find the touchpad option area and tick the double tap box.

Tapping will now work.

To get the Audio and the Ethernet, just follow the steps provided in my other Readme.

YOU WILL NOT GET WI-FI FROM THE DEFAULT WI-FI CARD!!! (You will need to replace the default card - google it)

Enjoy leopard on your Aspire One :D
